pages.text: 潛伏在海洋最深處的可怕怪物，不斷地等待著牠的下一個受害者。

The Barnacle, originally referred to as the Monster of the Ocean Depths, is a terror of the deep sea. It only spawns in the deepest of oceans and will chase any travelers that happen to stumble into its home. It can catch boats and grab players to pull them under the ocean surface. $(br2)Drops: $(l:items/barnacle_tooth)Barnacle Tooth$(/l)
